resources.string: In order to calibrate your device please, move your phone in the motion shown above, or rotate it through the axis.

Application is fully free of charge. Compass may have problems inside buildings and basements. 
Callibration which is presented in the application is a common way 
to callibrate most of the devices. 
If after these steps compass still not working in a proper way, probably 
there is something wrong with your device sensors. 


Thank you very much for downloading this application and enjoy.
